commit.message:
prune.exp: Remove "In (program|subroutine"block-data)" message from g77

2002-02-07  David Billinghurst <David.Billinghurst@riotinto.com>

	* lib/prune.exp: Remove "In (program|subroutine"block-data)"
	message from g77
	* lib/g77-dg.exp: Trim g77 error messages so that they are
	recognised by dg.exp.

From-SVN: r49599

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,10 @@
+2002-02-07  David Billinghurst <David.Billinghurst@riotinto.com>
+
+	* lib/prune.exp: Remove "In (program|subroutine"block-data)"
+	message from g77
+	* lib/g77-dg.exp: Trim g77 error messages so that they are
+	recognised by dg.exp.
+
 2002-02-07  David Billinghurst <David.Billinghurst@riotinto.com>
 
 	PR fortran/5473

@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@
 proc prune_gcc_output { text } {
     #send_user "Before:$text
"
 
-    regsub -all "(^|
)\[^
\]*: In (function|member|method|constructor|instantiation) \[^
\]*" $text "" text
+    regsub -all "(^|
)\[^
\]*: In (function|member|method|constructor|instantiation|program|subroutine|block-data) \[^
\]*" $text "" text
     regsub -all "(^|
)\[^
\]*: At (top level|global scope):\[^
\]*" $text "" text
     regsub -all "(^|
)collect2: ld returned \[^
\]*" $text "" text
     regsub -all "(^|
)Please submit.*instructions\[^
\]*" $text "" text
